meanings.definition: Attracting attention by being the most impressive or ostentatious.
meanings.sent1: The peacock with the showiest feathers caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The showiest car at the exhibition was covered in glittering lights.
meanings.sent3: The showiest cake at the party had so many sparkles, it looked like a disco ball.
meanings.sent4: Her showiest outfit made her stand out like a shining star in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The showiest fireworks lit up the night sky in a spectacular display.

meanings.definition: Displaying a flashy or extravagant appearance.
meanings.sent1: The showiest jewelry in the store was encrusted with colorful gems.
meanings.sent2: The showiest dancer on stage wore a costume covered in sequins.
meanings.sent3: The showiest car in the race had flames painted on the sides for extra flair.
meanings.sent4: Her showiest hat was so large, it blocked the sun like a parasol.
meanings.sent5: The showiest building in town was adorned with golden statues and intricate carvings.
